seng202.team1.Model

Class DataAnalyser

  • java.lang.Object
    • seng202.team1.Model.DataAnalyser

  • public final class DataAnalyser
extends java.lang.Object
    Static class that handles all of the data analysis required.
    Author:
    Josh Burt

    • Method Detail

      • calculateDistBetweenBikeTrips

        public static double calculateDistBetweenBikeTrips(BikeTrip b1,
                                                   BikeTrip b2)
        Calculates the distance (as the crow flies) between two points on a bike trip. If the same bike trip is passed in twice, the length of the bike trip is calculated. Otherwise, the distance between the two starting points is calculated.
        Parameters:
        b1 - first bike trip
        b2 - second bike trip
        Returns:
        the distance between the two points

      • searchBikeTrips

        public static java.util.ArrayList<BikeTrip> searchBikeTrips(double searchLat,
                                                            double searchLong,
                                                            double delta,
                                                            java.util.ArrayList<BikeTrip> trips)
        Takes a latitude, longitude and a distance delta and iterates through a list of bike trips returning all trips within the distance delta of the point (latitude, longitude) in an arraylist.
        Parameters:
        searchLat - Latitude to start the search at
        searchLong - Longitude to start the search at
        delta - radius to search in
        trips - list of bike trips
        Returns:
        a list of bike trips close to the point

      • searchWifiPoints

        public static java.util.ArrayList<WifiPoint> searchWifiPoints(double searchLat,
                                                              double searchLong,
                                                              double delta,
                                                              java.util.ArrayList<WifiPoint> hotspots)
        Takes a latitude, longitude and distance delta and iterates through a list of wifi points Returns all points within the specified distance from the lat and long
        Parameters:
        searchLat - Latitude to start the search at
        searchLong - Longitude to start the search at
        delta - radius to search in
        hotspots - ArrayList of WiFi points to search through
        Returns:
        a list of wifi points close the point

      • findClosestWifiToBikeRouteStart

        public static WifiPoint findClosestWifiToBikeRouteStart(BikeTrip trip,
                                                        java.util.ArrayList<WifiPoint> hotspots)
        Takes a Biketrip and returns the closest WifiPoint, within 1000m, to the start of the bike trip. Returns null if no WifiPoint is found
        Parameters:
        trip - Bike trip that needs to have the closest point found
        hotspots - ArrayList of WifiPoints to search through
        Returns:
        the closest WifiPoint to the start of the bike trip

      • findClosestWifiToBikeRouteEnd

        public static WifiPoint findClosestWifiToBikeRouteEnd(BikeTrip trip,
                                                      java.util.ArrayList<WifiPoint> hotspots)
        Takes a BikeTrip and returns the closest WifiPoint, within 1000m, to the end of the bike trip. Returns null if no WifiPoint is found.
        Parameters:
        trip - Bike trip that needs to have the closest point found
        hotspots - ArrayList of WifiPoints to search through
        Returns:
        the closes WifiPoint to the end of the bike trip

      • findClosestWifiPointToTrip

        public static WifiPoint findClosestWifiPointToTrip(BikeTrip trip,
                                                   java.util.ArrayList<WifiPoint> hotspots)
        Takes a BikeTrip and returns the closest point to the either the start or end of the trip If both closest points are the same distance apart the one closest to the start is returned. If no such point exists, null is returned.
        Parameters:
        trip - Bike trip that needs to have the closest point found
        hotspots - ArrayList of wifiPoints to search through
        Returns:
        the closest WifiPoint to the start/end of the bike trip

      • findClosestWifiToRoute

        public static WifiPoint findClosestWifiToRoute(java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.geom.Point2D.Float> waypoints,
                                               java.util.ArrayList<WifiPoint> hotspots)
        Takes a list of waypoints as points and then iterates through the points and discovers which is the closest wifi point on the route. It then returns the Wifi point.
        Parameters:
        waypoints - ArrayList of waypoints
        hotspots - ArrayList of wifipoints to search through
        Returns:
        the closest wifi point to any of the waypoints

      • calculateDistance

        public static double calculateDistance(double startLat,
                                       double startLong,
                                       double endLat,
                                       double endLong)
        Generic version of calculate distance using Latitude and Longitude. Takes the start and end coords as arguments and then using the rule of haversines calculates an approximation to the distance. Given that the Earth is not a perfect sphere, this is only an approximaiton. Distance is calculated as the crow flies.
        Parameters:
        startLat - Double Latitude to start the search at
        startLong - Double Longitude to start the search at
        endLat - Double Latitude to end the search at
        endLong - Double Longitude to end the search at
        Returns:
        Double

      • sortTripsByDistance

        public static void sortTripsByDistance(java.util.ArrayList<BikeTrip> toSort)
        Takes a list of Biketrips and sorts it in place based on trip distance Uses the default java sort and a comparator on the tripDistance.
        Parameters:
        toSort - ArrayList of bike trips to be sorted

      • findClosestRetailerToBikeTrip

        public static int findClosestRetailerToBikeTrip(java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.geom.Point2D.Float> waypoints,
                                                java.util.ArrayList<RetailerLocation> retailers)
        Takes a list of waypoints and a list of retailers and returns the index of the closest retailer. If no points are given, it returns -1 flag.
        Parameters:
        waypoints - List of waypoints to be searched
        retailers - List of retailers to be searched.
        Returns:
        index of closest retailer.

      • findClosestRetailerToWifiPoint

        public static int findClosestRetailerToWifiPoint(WifiPoint hotspot,
                                                 java.util.ArrayList<RetailerLocation> retailers)
        Takes a WifiPoint and a list of retailers and returns the index of the closest Retailer to the wifipoint.
        Parameters:
        hotspot - a single wifipoint
        retailers - an list of retailers that need the closest hotspot returned
        Returns:
        index of closest retailer

      • findClosestWifiPointToRetailer

        public static int findClosestWifiPointToRetailer(java.util.ArrayList<WifiPoint> hotspots,
                                                 RetailerLocation retailer)
        Takes a Retailer and a list of WifiPoints and returns the index of the closest wifiPoint to the retailer.
        Parameters:
        hotspots - List of Wifi hotpsots
        retailer - a single retailer
        Returns:
        index of closest wifipoint

      • sortWifiByDistanceFromPoint

        public static void sortWifiByDistanceFromPoint(java.util.ArrayList<WifiPoint> toSort,
                                               java.awt.geom.Point2D.Float testPoint)
        Takes a list of wifiPoints and a point and sorts the list in place based on the distance from the given point. Also appends a field distanceFrom onto WifiPoint.
        Parameters:
        toSort - List to be sorted
        testPoint - point to get Distance from

      • sortRetailerByDistanceFromPoint

        public static void sortRetailerByDistanceFromPoint(java.util.ArrayList<RetailerLocation> toSort,
                                                   java.awt.geom.Point2D.Float testPoint)
        Takes a list of RetailerLocations and sorts them in place based on the distance from the test point.
        Parameters:
        toSort - List of Retailers to be sorted
        testPoint - Point to find distance from
